title: How to Make Banana Cream Cheese Frosting

steps.headline: Measure and add the butter, sour cream, and cream cheese in a large bowl.
Beat everything together until smooth and light in color.
Add the remaining ingredients to the bowl.
Continue mixing.
steps.description: You want to achieve a fluffy and creamy mixture.

steps.headline: Use immediately on a cooled cake.
steps.description: You can also use clear wrap on the bowl and chill in the refrigerator until ready to use.
